title: Need Suggestions for Ecommerce-esque typefaces
content:
Hi All,

I'm looking for a font family similiar to ones used in print circulars that display 'pricing' and short callouts like 'SAVE $99'. I'm designing some ecommerce related digital material, but have never worked with circulars. If anyone has worked with print circulars or anything related, can you please share some great typefaces I can use.

Thanks in advance!

-dub
author: dubstyleenation

comments.content: posting an image would really help here
I'll try out Trade Gothic. Thanks.
